content.description: Starts on huge shelf directly in the middle of the boulder, extremely good feet. Match  huge shelf, long left to ArÃªte, lock heel in slot and throw to dynamic powerful right crimp. Cross into huge jug, match and throw to superb ledge and proceed to top out.
content.protection: Boulder is surrounded by dead shrubs, and tree's so it makes challenging difficult, but two crash pads should suffice.
content.location: Follow the trail past short stuff as if you are headed to oreo and the boulder will be on your left maybe 15 yards past. The boulder is pretty chalked up so it should be hard to miss.

content.description: Boulder makes a peak formation, and quality looks deceptive but is really strong. The boulder is surrounded by dead tree's and shrubs so it makes spotting challenging.
